messages.subject: Re: Idaho Schools
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know and I m not going to ask.  I just keep repeating that I support parents and that if she wants her daughter in school I support that (keep my mouth
messages.messageBody:
I don't know and I'm not going to ask. I just keep repeating that I
support parents and that if she wants her daughter in school I support
that (keep my mouth shut about the ritalin, although she knows my
opinion)
LJ

>
>My next door neighbor got all the way through the public schools here
>and
>she cannot read or write. What does you sil think is so fantastic
>about
>the schools here that there should be no legal alternatives? (Besides
>her
>salary I mean.)
>
>Nanci K. in Idaho

messages.subject: Re: Idaho Schools
messages.msgSnippet: ... My next door neighbor got all the way through the public schools here and she cannot read or write.  What does you sil think is so fantastic about the
messages.messageBody:
At 07:36 AM 8/9/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: linjoy w <linjoy1@...>
>
>My sil works in the schools in Idaho, gives her kid ritalin and is anti
>homeschooling - would make it against the law if she could, go figure.
>LJ

My next door neighbor got all the way through the public schools here and
she cannot read or write. What does you sil think is so fantastic about
the schools here that there should be no legal alternatives? (Besides her
salary I mean.)

Nanci K. in Idaho
